name: The Stork of Hope
description:
Humanity lives isolated in the underground dwellings. 

Survivors are rarely visiting the surface to check if they can finally REBUILD their society.  

They look for the proof that life can exist again under the sun.  You are the STORK OF HOPE!  You are the symbol of Life and the New Beginning!  

Fly just above Survivors' heads (really CLOSE!) and let them know that the Time Has Come!
